title: Just bought Ekko in the store?
body:
So, Ekko is in the store atm.

http://i.imgur.com/kw0U3N8.png

http://i.imgur.com/XnA4IZd.png

replies.body: Sorry for the late response folks, we accidentally released Ekko before the patch. Anyone who purchased it before it was ready should have received a full refund by now. If you did not, please submit a ticket or respond here for us to investigate.
Same on me and the bundle is still available in store, and i'm worring if that the purchase failed :(
yeah same, i've takin a photo just incase so i can email riot if it does fail
i brought him too but i can't play him in norms
same. and in the store i still can buy ekko again.
yep the exact same as me, which is kinda shit. I really want to play him now that i have him

> [{quoted}](name=SEKAI,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=39naEHPJ,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-05-28T15:30:29.511+0000)
>
> About time.

I didnt think we had the patch yet.
